EmailTemplate.name: 2015 STC ALERT 3.2015 EMEAI STC ALERT email
EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell STC Alert Mailing
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
STC Alert - Dealer Notification Dear Valued Partner, We are delighted to announce the following European STC Approval. Product Name
TPU-100B
Platforms Certified
Falcon 900 A/B Falcon 50
Sales Bulletin No.
HSB 2015-11 Rev B
STC Service Centre Owner
Jet Aviation
STC Service Centre Contact
klaus.boehmer@jetaviation.ch The TPU-100B provides operators of the Falcon 900 A/B and Falcon 50 with compliance to the imminent TCAS Change 7.1 mandate. The EuroControl deadline for compliance with TCAS Change 7.1 for retrofit is December 1st, 2015. This mandate therefore provides us with a unique opportunity to drive growth across our businesses before the end of 2015. To download a copy of the Honeywell Sales Bulletin Click Here <https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/SB%202015_11_Rev%20B.pdf> . For more information visit aerospace.honeywell.com <http://www.aerospace.honeywell.com> Privacy Statement <#> Terms & Conditions <#>
